players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

You: "
"

Diana: "I am the detective and I know Bob is mafia.
"

Charlie: "I am a villager and I don't know who the mafia is.
"
Charlie: "I'm still trying to figure out who the mafia is. Any clues or information you can share would be helpful."
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Keep an eye on Diana, she might be suspicious of me."
Diana: "I am the detective and I have identified Bob as the mafioso. Keep an eye on him, especially since he knows I suspect him."
